name: Keeping the Faith
tagline: A story about two friends, a priest and a rabbi, who fall in love with the same beauty (Jenna Elfman).

name: The Change-Up
tagline: Dave is a married man with two kids and a loving wife , and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain when lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

name: 28 Days
tagline: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.

name: Fight Club
tagline: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

name: The Family That Preys
tagline: Two families from different walks of life learn to work together.

name: Clockstoppers
tagline: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

name: Sphere
tagline: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

name: State of Play
tagline: When a congressional aide is killed, a Washington D.C. journalist starts investigating the case involving the congressman, his old college friend.

name: Carlito's Way
tagline: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.

name: That's My Boy
tagline: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.

name: Uptown Girls
tagline: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, start working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places

name: The Family
tagline: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.

name: 16 Blocks
tagline: An aging cop is assigned the ordinary task of escorting a fast-talking witness from police custody to a courthouse. There are however forces at work trying to stop prevent them from making it.

name: Matchstick Men
tagline: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

name: Just Cause
tagline: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after 25 years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.

name: Notorious
tagline: The life and death story of Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

name: Kiss of the Dragon
tagline: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.

name: My Favorite Martian
tagline: A martian lands on Earth and makes friends with a reporter.

name: The Brave One
tagline: A woman struggles to recover from a brutal attack by setting out on a mission for revenge.

name: Bounce
tagline: A man switches plane tickets with another man who dies in that plane in a crash. The man falls in love with the deceased one's wife.

name: The Heartbreak Kid
tagline: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.

name: Junior
tagline: As part of a fertility research project, a male scientist agrees to carry a pregnancy in his own body.

name: Alive
tagline: Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.

name: Recess: School's Out
tagline: TJ and company must save summer vacation from disappearing forever.

name: Colombiana
tagline: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

name: Vampires Suck
tagline: A spoof of vampire-themed movies, where teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.

name: Gung Ho
tagline: When a Japanese car company buys an American plant, the American liason must mediate the clash of work attitudes between the foreign management and native labor.

name: Taxi
tagline: A mouthy and feisty taxicab driver has hot tips for a green and inept cop set on solving a string of New York City bank robberies committed by a quartet of female Brazilian bank robbers.

name: The 'Burbs
tagline: An overstressed suburbanite and his paramilitaric neighbor struggle to prove their paranoid theory that the new family in town is a front for a cannibalistic cult.

name: Freedom Writers
tagline: A young teacher inspires her class of at-risk students to learn tolerance, apply themselves, and pursue education beyond high school.

name: Escape from Alcatraz
tagline: A dramatization of the one possibly successful escape from the notorious prison.

name: Soapdish
tagline: An ambitious TV soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.

name: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
tagline: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.

name: Son in Law
tagline: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.

name: Vegas Vacation
tagline: In the fourth outing for the vacation franchise, the Griswolds have to survive Vegas fever when they go to Las Vegas for a fun family vacation.

name: The Thin Red Line
tagline: Terrence Malick's adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Sucker Punch
tagline: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.

name: Beauty Shop
tagline: Gina is a hairstylist who opens up a beauty shop full of employees and customers more interested in speaking their minds than getting a cut.

name: Accepted
tagline: A high school slacker who's rejected by every school he applies to opts to create his own institution of higher learning, the South Harmon Institute of Technology, on a rundown piece of property near his hometown.

name: Universal Soldier
tagline: Luc and Scott were killed in Vietnam, but the army has a secret project for reanimating dead people as near-perfect soldiers.

name: 8MM

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

tagline: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

name: The Sentinel
tagline: A secret service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the president. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a relentless FBI agent.

name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
tagline: A former Australian policeman is rescued by a tribe of children when he is banished from a desert town and sent into the desert to die by the desert town's evil queen.

name: Friday the 13th Part III
tagline: Having escaped, Jason Voorhees is back, hockey mask and all, to continue his murderous rampage across Camp Crystal Lake.

name: Breakin'
tagline: 'Breakin': A struggling young jazz dancer (Lucinda Dickey) meets up with two break-dancers. Together they become the sensation of the street crowds. Features ICE-T in his film debut as a club MC.

name: Walking with Dinosaurs 3D
tagline: See and feel what it was like when dinosaurs ruled the Earth, in a story where an underdog dino triumphs to become a hero for the ages.

name: Death Race
tagline: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

name: Hanging Up

production.name: Global Entertainment Productions GmbH & Company Medien KG

tagline: A trio of sisters bond over their ambivalence toward the approaching death of their curmudgeonly father, to whom none of them was particularly close.

name: Derailed
tagline: When two married business executives having an affair are blackmailed by a violent criminal, the two must turn the tables on him to save their families.

name: The Born Losers
tagline: Billy Jack battles outlaw motorcycle gang in a small California beach town.

name: The Greatest Show on Earth
tagline: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer against a background of circus spectacle.

name: What a Girl Wants
tagline: An American teenager learns that her father is a wealthy British politician running for office. Although she is eager to find him, she realizes it could cause a scandal and cost him the election.

name: Mortal Kombat: Annihilation
tagline: A group of martial arts warriors have only six days to save the Earth from an extra-dimensional invasion.

name: The Pink Panther 2
tagline: Insp. Jacques Clouseau teams up with a squad of International detectives who are just as bumbling as he is. Their mission: Stop a globe-trotting thief who specializes in stealing historical artifacts.

name: In the Bedroom
tagline: A New England couple's college-aged son dates an older woman who has two small children and an unwelcome ex-husband.

name: Shine
tagline: Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.

name: The Island
tagline: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a "harvestable being", and is being kept as a source of replacement parts, along with others, in a Utopian facility.

name: National Security
tagline: Two mismatched security guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling operation.

name: Trouble with the Curve
tagline: An ailing baseball scout in his twilight years takes his daughter along for one last recruiting trip.

name: Changeling
tagline: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it stubbornly tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child, while also refusing to give up hope that she will find him one day.

name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
tagline: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and 'Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves' in particular.

name: Smokin' Aces
tagline: When a Las Vegas performer-turned-snitch named Buddy Israel decides to turn state's evidence and testify against the mob, it seems that a whole lot of people would like to make sure he's no longer breathing.

name: Silkwood
tagline: The story of Karen Silkwood, a metallurgy worker at a plutonium processing plant who was purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing blatant worker safety violations at the plant.

name: The American
tagline: An assassin hides out in Italy for one last assignment.

name: Larry Crowne
tagline: After losing his job, a middle-aged man reinvents himself by going back to college.

name: No Way Out
tagline: A coverup and witchhunt occur after a politician accidentally kills his mistress.

name: The Ringer
tagline: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

name: Selena
tagline: The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

name: Mermaids
tagline: An unconventional single mother relocates with her two daughters to a small Massachusetts town in 1963, where a number of events and relationships both challenge and strengthen their familial bonds.

name: Live and Let Die
tagline: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

name: The Messengers
tagline: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder.

name: A Goofy Movie
tagline: When Max makes an preposterous promise to his girlfriend, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.

name: Money Train
tagline: A vengeful New York transit cop decides to steal a trainload of subway fares; his foster brother, a fellow cop, tries to protect him.

name: Frankenweenie
tagline: Young Victor conducts a science experiment to bring his beloved dog Sparky back to life, only to face unintended, sometimes monstrous, consequences.

name: Children of Men
tagline: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

name: Carrie
tagline: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

name: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
tagline: In this live-action prequel to the 1994 comedy hit, the Flintstones and the Rubbles go on a trip to Rock Vegas, where Wilma is pursued by playboy Chip Rockefeller.

name: The Mothman Prophecies
tagline: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

name: The Doors
tagline: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

name: K-19: The Widowmaker

production.name: IMF Internationale Medien und Film GmbH & Co. 2. Produktions KG

tagline: When Russia's first nuclear submarine malfunctions on its maiden voyage, the crew must race to save the ship and prevent a nuclear disaster.

name: For Love of the Game
tagline: A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
tagline: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.

name: Jeepers Creepers II
tagline: Set a few days after the original, a championship basketball team's bus is attacked by The Creeper, the winged, flesh-eating terror, on the last day of his 23-day feeding frenzy.

name: Dragon: The Bruce Lee Story
tagline: A lionized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.

name: Intolerable Cruelty
tagline: A revenge-seeking gold digger marries a womanizing Beverly Hills lawyer with the intention of making a killing in the divorce.

name: Deck the Halls
tagline: Two neighbors have it out after one of them decorates his house for the holidays so brightly that it can be seen from space.

name: The Number 23
tagline: Walter Sparrow becomes obsessed with a novel that he believes was written about him. As his obsession increases, more and more similarities seem to arise.

name: Step Up Revolution
tagline: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

name: Drive
tagline: A mysterious Hollywood stuntman, mechanic and getaway driver lands himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

name: A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas
tagline: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.

name: Green Zone
tagline: Discovering covert and faulty intelligence causes a U.S. Army officer to go rogue as he hunts for Weapons of Mass Destruction in an unstable region.
